mapper.select:
SELECT orgnzid, [name], nrmTotal, vccTotal, nowTotal, psbTotal FROM (SELECT o.orgnzid , name , NVL(dept1nrm, 0) + NVL(dept2nrm, 0) + NVL(dept3nrm, 0) + NVL(dept4nrm, 0)+ NVL(dept5nrm, 0) + NVL(dept6nrm, 0) + NVL(dept7nrm, 0) AS nrmTotal , NVL(dept1vcc, 0) + NVL(dept2vcc, 0) + NVL(dept3vcc, 0) + NVL(dept4vcc, 0)+ NVL(dept5vcc, 0) + NVL(dept6vcc, 0) + NVL(dept7vcc, 0) AS vccTotal , (NVL(dept1nrm, 0) + NVL(dept2nrm, 0) + NVL(dept3nrm, 0) + NVL(dept4nrm, 0)+ NVL(dept5nrm, 0)) - (NVL(dept1vcc, 0) + NVL(dept2vcc, 0) + NVL(dept3vcc, 0) + NVL(dept4vcc, 0)+ NVL(dept5vcc, 0)) AS psbTotal , NVL(u.cnt, 0) AS nowTotal , o.applorgnzyn FROM orgnz o LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT orgnzid, count(1) AS cnt FROM [user] GROUP BY orgnzid) u ON o.orgnzid = u.orgnzid )
ORDER BY o.name LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT orgnzid , name , NVL((dept1nrm + dept2nrm + dept3nrm + dept4nrm + dept5nrm), 0) AS nrmTotal , NVL((dept1vcc + dept2vcc + dept3vcc + dept4vcc + dept5vcc), 0) AS vccTotal , applorgnzyn FROM orgnz )

SELECT o.orgnzId , o.name , NVL(dept1nrm, 0) AS dept1nrm , NVL(dept1vcc, 0) AS dept1vcc , NVL(dept1Now, 0) AS dept1Now , NVL(dept2nrm, 0) AS dept2nrm , NVL(dept2vcc, 0) AS dept2vcc , NVL(dept2Now, 0) AS dept2Now , NVL(dept3nrm, 0) AS dept3nrm , NVL(dept3vcc, 0) AS dept3vcc , NVL(dept3Now, 0) AS dept3Now , NVL(dept4nrm, 0) AS dept4nrm , NVL(dept4vcc, 0) AS dept4vcc , NVL(dept4Now, 0) AS dept4Now , NVL(dept5nrm, 0) AS dept5nrm , NVL(dept5vcc, 0) AS dept5vcc , NVL(dept5Now, 0) AS dept5Now , NVL(dept6nrm, 0) AS dept6nrm , NVL(dept6vcc, 0) AS dept6vcc , NVL(dept6Now, 0) AS dept6Now , NVL(dept7nrm, 0) AS dept7nrm , NVL(dept7vcc, 0) AS dept7vcc , NVL(dept7Now, 0) AS dept7Now , NVL(dept1nrm, 0) + NVL(dept2nrm, 0) + NVL(dept3nrm, 0) + NVL(dept4nrm, 0)+ NVL(dept5nrm, 0) + NVL(dept6nrm, 0) + NVL(dept7nrm, 0) AS nrmTotal , NVL(dept1vcc, 0) + NVL(dept2vcc, 0) + NVL(dept3vcc, 0) + NVL(dept4vcc, 0)+ NVL(dept5vcc, 0) + NVL(dept6vcc, 0) + NVL(dept7vcc, 0) AS vccTotal , NVL(dept1Now, 0) + NVL(dept2Now, 0) + NVL(dept3Now, 0) + NVL(dept4Now, 0)+ NVL(dept5Now, 0) + NVL(dept6Now, 0) + NVL(dept7vcc, 0) AS nowTotal , NVL(special, 0) AS special , NVL(applorgnzyn, 'N') as applorgnzyn FROM orgnz o LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT orgnzid , SUM(IF(rankcodeid = 'RNK001', 1, 0)) AS dept1Now , SUM(IF(rankcodeid = 'RNK002', 1, 0)) AS dept2Now , SUM(IF(rankcodeid = 'RNK003', 1, 0)) AS dept3Now , SUM(IF(rankcodeid = 'RNK004', 1, 0)) AS dept4Now , SUM(IF(rankcodeid = 'RNK005', 1, 0)) AS dept5Now , SUM(IF(rankcodeid = 'RNK006', 1, 0)) AS dept6Now , SUM(IF(rankcodeid = 'RNK007', 1, 0)) AS dept7Now FROM [user] WHERE orgnzId = #{value} GROUP BY orgnzid) u ON o.orgnzid = u.orgnzid WHERE o.orgnzId = #{value}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM login WHERE userid in (select userid from [user] where orgnzId = #{value})
DELETE FROM psnnl WHERE userid in (select userid from [user] where orgnzId = #{value})
DELETE FROM psnnl_manual WHERE userid in (select userid from [user] where orgnzId = #{value})
mapper.select: SELECT orgnzid , [name] FROM orgnz WHERE applorgnzyn = #{value} ORDER BY [name]
